boofcv.app.calib

Class ImageSelectorAndSaver

  • java.lang.Object
    • boofcv.app.calib.ImageSelectorAndSaver

  • public class ImageSelectorAndSaver
extends java.lang.Object
    Selects which image to same based on how sharp it is and then saves them to the disk

        public void process(boofcv.struct.image.GrayF32 image,
                    java.util.List<georegression.struct.point.Point2D_F64> sides)
        Computes the sharpness score for the current image, if better than the current best image it's then saved.
        Parameters:
        image - Gray scale input image for detector
        sides - Location of 4 corners on fiducial
